p.k: This month the journey starts from the Carribean and the island of Saint Maaarten for the 39th Heineken Regatta. Staying on the west of the Atlantic wand then will move north to Miami for the popular Bacardi Cup. Changing scenery again, we then head to Asia for the Mussanah Race Week. Final stop for this month's trip around the world is Europe and Marina di Villasimius, where the 2019 sailing season organized by Melges Europe starts, with the Melges 32 fleet being the first protagonist.
